channel.title: Psp on Tardigrade's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in Psp on Tardigrade's dev blog

item.title: [PSP] AntiTetris
item.description: AntiTetris A homebrew game for PSP. AntiTetris is a visual reproduction of the Game Boy Tetris, but based on a physics engine. Lines are not implemented. The aim is to stack up as many tetrominoes as possible before they reach the top of the screen. Download: AntiTetris.zip Source: AntiTetris_src.zip Vid√©o: http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x61qf5_antitetris-psp-homebrew_videogames Credits: Development: Tardigrade Graphics library: JGE++ Physics engine: Chipmunk

item.title: [PSP] Game&Watch Fantasies
item.description: Game&Watch Fantasies A homebrew game for PSP. Download: GWF.zip / GWFv2.zip Source: GWFv2_src.zip Game&Watch Fantasies is a puzzle/platform game for the PSP, inspired by the Game&Watch LCD games. Rule #1: Just like in a Game&Watch, the hero moves discontinuously. Therefore, he can “teleport” through thin obstacles by simply walking or jumping. However, gravity doesn’t allow him to do so: it is impossible to go through an obstacle when falling. Rule #2: If the obstacle is too large, the hero will move until he touches it.
